page.title: 09OUR SCHOOL AT PURITON
page.content: The area is served by two{schools,} both of which have split sites built at different times. In{Puriton }the infant department is at the Rye and the Junior department at Rowlands Rise.In September 1986 a new part of the school will hopefully be opened at Rowlands Rise, and all children from 5 to 11 will attend.At present about 185 children are educated at this school. The school was built in 1860,its log registers back to 1874 when it was noted that a number of children were absent for{"hay making" and "vegetable {picking".}The present Headteacher is Mr Brian Freestone,a keen Cricketer. He has six teaching staff Mrs Skillicorn,Mrs S Gallow,Mrs S Mcbride, Mrs K Knight,Mr I McKenzie and Mr M Narraway.
